stories.title: Boost the speed of spotlight search in Mac-OS

stories.text:
Live at https://terrapinfinance.com

Why we're building this?

Banks give you a pittance on your savings accounts. Most people (me included) keep their day-to-day money in checking accounts, and long-term money (10+ year horizon) in index funds or similar investments. However, if you want to save for a rainy day or a large purchase in the 1-3 year time frame, investments aren't appropriate because there's money at risk, and existing savings accounts give you pretty much no interest, meaning that your money just shrinks to inflation.

At Terrapin we will strip all superfluous operational costs in order to pass a market-leading interest onto you. Additionally, we will make away with the excessive terms and conditions imposed by most savings accounts (e.g. minimum deposits, having to sign-up for unwanted services from the same provider, etc), in order to give you the simplest, most easy-to-use savings account out there.

What's next?

As part of the pre-launch, we're inviting users to join the waiting list while development continues in the background. We're looking for feedback from this community, both in terms of the landing page and what you would like to get from a service like this.

If this is a service you'd like to use when it goes live, do not hesitate to sign-up for the waiting list :).
